snippet: The Olympic champion Petter Northug Jr. of Norway took the overall lead in the Tour de Ski after winning a 35-kilometer free pursuit race in Dobbiaco, Italy.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Petter Northug Jr. of Norway took the overall lead in the Tour de Ski after winning a 35-kilometer free pursuit race in Dobbiaco, Italy.

headline.main: Norwegian Takes Lead in Tour de Ski
headline.print_headline: Norwegian Takes Tour de Ski Lead
